question: 301. You have a custom VPC with a public subnet. The VPC has an internet gateway attached to it. What else should you do to ensure that instances within the subnet can reach the Internet?
options: A. Add a route to the route table that directs traffic directed at the public Internet to go through the internet gateway.
D. The instances should have public access with this configuration already.
B. Add a rule to the security group allowing outbound traffic out via HTTP.
C. Ensure that each instance has a public IP address.
answers: A. Add a route to the route table that directs traffic directed at the public Internet to go through the internet gateway.

question: 302. Which types of content can CloudFront cache?
options: A. Static and dynamic content
C. Dynamic content, but not static content
B. Static content, but not dynamic content
D. CloudFront is not a caching mechanism.
answers: A. Static and dynamic content

question: 303. You have web applications that are serving up content via a large RDS instance. You are seeing heavy database utilization and want to improve performance. What might you suggest? (Choose two.)
options: D. Add an additional fleet of EC2 instances to serve the web content.
C. Set up CloudFront to handle dynamic content as well as static content.
B. Increase the instance size of the web application servers.
A. Increase the instance size of the database.
answers: C. Set up CloudFront to handle dynamic content as well as static content.
A. Increase the instance size of the database.

question: 304. You are tasked with creating a new VPC for a large company, hosting a fleet of instances within the VPC, and ensuring that they can write to the company’s S3 buckets and also be accessed via a REST API that they each host. Which of the following would be part of your proposed solution? (Choose two.)
options: D. A new NACL
A. A customer gateway
C. A VPC endpoint
B. An internet gateway
answers: C. A VPC endpoint
B. An internet gateway

question: 305. You are tasked with hosting a fleet of instances within the default VPC of a company’s AWS account and ensuring that the instances can write to the company’s S3 buckets and also be accessed via a REST API that they each host. Which of the following would be part of your proposed solution? (Choose two.)
options: D. An updated set of rules for the NACL
A. A customer gateway
C. A VPC endpoint
B. An internet gateway
answers: C. A VPC endpoint
D. An updated set of rules for the NACL

question: 306. You have been asked to troubleshoot a Direct Connect connection between your company’s on-site data center and a subnet within a public VPC. You have confirmed that you can reach the instances in the VPC from your data center, but those instances cannot reach back to your data center. What would you investigate? (Choose two.)
options: D. The virtual private gateway configuration
A. The VPC subnet’s routing table
B. The on-site storage gateway
C. The NAT instance in your VPC
answers: D. The virtual private gateway configuration
A. The VPC subnet’s routing table

question: 307. What is route propagation with respect to a virtual private gateway?
options: D. It enables storage-based traffic from a customer’s storage gateway
A. It copies all routes from an on-site network to an AWS VPC’s subnets routing tables.
C. It automatically allows inbound traffic from your on-premises connection.
B. It helps avoid manually entering VPN routes into your VPC routing tables.
answers: B. It helps avoid manually entering VPN routes into your VPC routing tables.

question: 308. What URL provides you with the public and private IP addresses of running EC2 instances?
options: B. http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/
D. http://169.254.169.254/latest/instance-data/
C. http://169.254.169.254/instance-data/
answers: B. http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/

question: 309. Which of the following is a highly durable key-value store?
options: C. EBS
D. ElastiCache
A. S3
B. EFS
answers: A. S3

question: 310. Which of the following is a valid Glacier use case?
options: C. Storing patient images used in the scheduling department’s web-based software
D. Storing X-rays used in teaching exercises at the local college
B. Storing medical records in case of annual audits
A. Storing insurance documents accessed once or twice a day by mobile clients
answers: B. Storing medical records in case of annual audits

question: 311. You have been called in to mitigate a disastrous loss of data on S3 at a bioethics company. After investigating, it is determined that the data was deleted accidentally by a developer. The company wants to ensure that data cannot be accidentally deleted like this in the future. What would you suggest? (Choose two.)
options: B. Create an IAM policy that disallows developers from deleting data in S3.
A. Enable S3 versioning on all S3 buckets.
C. Replace the current access pattern with signed URLs.
D. Enable MFA Delete on the buckets.
answers: A. Enable S3 versioning on all S3 buckets.
D. Enable MFA Delete on the buckets.

question: 312. How many instances can you launch in a given AWS region?
options: D. 40, but this is a soft limit and can be increased by AWS
C. 20, but this is a soft limit and can be increased by AWS
answers: C. 20, but this is a soft limit and can be increased by AWS

question: 313. You are using a NAT instance inside of a VPC to support routing out to the public Internet from private instances within that VPC. As traffic has increased, the performance of any operations involving the outbound Internet traffic has degraded to unacceptable levels. How would you mitigate this problem?
options: C. Increase the instance size of the NAT instance by one or more instance size classes.
A. Add an additional internet gateway so the NAT instance can split outbound traffic over two gateways.
D. All of these are valid solutions.
B. Add an additional elastic IP to the NAT instance to increase throughput.
answers: C. Increase the instance size of the NAT instance by one or more instance size classes.

question: 314. What is the simplest way to reduce frequent scaling in an application? For example, if an application is showing that it’s scaling up and down multiple times in an hour, how would you reduce the number of “ups and downs” you are seeing?
options: D. None of these will improve the issue.
C. Update CloudWatch to use a FIFO termination policy, only terminating the oldest instances in a scaledown.
A. Set up scheduled times with proactive cycling for the scaling so that it is not occurring all the time.
B. Increase the cooldown timers so that scaling down requires greater thresholds of change in your triggers.
answers: B. Increase the cooldown timers so that scaling down requires greater thresholds of change in your triggers.

question: 315. Which of these steps are required to get a NAT instance working? (Choose two.)
options: D. Set the NAT instance to allow port forwarding from the private subnet.
A. Update the routing table for EC2 instances accessing the public Internet to go through the NAT instance.
C. Disable source/destination checks on your instance.
B. Locate the NAT instance within the private subnet that it will be serving.
answers: A. Update the routing table for EC2 instances accessing the public Internet to go through the NAT instance.
C. Disable source/destination checks on your instance.

question: 316. Which of these is not a default CloudWatch metric?
options: C. CPU usage
D. Inbound network traffic
B. Memory usage
A. Disk read operations
answers: B. Memory usage

question: 317. You have an existing fleet of EC2 instances in a public subnet of your VPC. You launch an additional instance from the same AMI as the existing instances, into the same public subnet. What steps might you need to take to ensure that this instance can reach the public Internet? (Choose two.)
options: D. Ensure that the instance has a route out to the Internet.
B. Add the instance to the ELB serving the existing instances.
C. Add the instance into a private subnet.
A. Assign an elastic IP address to the instance.
answers: B. Add the instance to the ELB serving the existing instances.
A. Assign an elastic IP address to the instance.

question: 318. Which of the following is the destination address for the public Internet?
319. Which of the following would you use to route traffic from your subnet to the public Internet?
options: A. Destination: 0.0.0.0/0 ➢ Target: your internet gateway
D. Destination: 0.0.0.0/0 ➢ Target: your virtual private gateway
C. Destination: your internet gateway ➢ Target: 0.0.0.0/0
B. Destination: 0.0.0.0/16 ➢ Target: your internet gateway
answers: A. Destination: 0.0.0.0/0 ➢ Target: your internet gateway
